name: Quest for Toothbrush: Totally Ordinary Game About Cowboys
name_original: Quest for Toothbrush: Totally Ordinary Game About Cowboys
description:
This game is a submission for Brackey's Game Jam

PLEASE PLAY THE GAME IN FULL-SCREEN MODE, IT DOESN'T WORK WELL IN WINDOWED

Also the last screen, when you finish the game, isnt working for some reason. That's a bummer, but there was jus one sentence and a button to main menu :D

ALSO, in the last room - CLIMB THE RIGHT WALL IM AN IDIOT I MADE THAT LEVEL AT 3 AM xd

WELCOME TO ABSERIKA

The world ended with the Big Badabum - a nuclear war, that wiped entire civilizations. You were a member of the secret Cowboy Order, but as the bomb fell you turned into a pile of bones. 

And then you woke up. 

As a living slime, surrounded by other living slimes. 

And the only question on your mind was: "Where the hell is my toothbrush?"

Controls:

A-D - movement

S - Look/ aim down

W - Aim Up

Shift - Dash

E - climb the wall (you have to be facing the wall)

Spacebar - jump/climb wall (if in the climbing mode)

If you enjoyed this game,

you can check out my other projects, all made in the same world.

THESE GAMES ARE NOT PART OF THE GAMEJAM :)

Totally Ordinary Cowboy Runner:

And Sweatshop Sunshine: A Totally Ordinary Game About Production:

Yall can also check out my Twitter and YouTube, I'd appreciate that :)
